chunks.chunk_text: Hello, hello you guys welcome to our Saturday episode of 15 minutes inspirations your daily dose of English learning and motivation You are now listening to John and in the next 15 minutes We are going to explore powerful quotes from some of the world's most inspiring figures Whether you are commuting working out or just taking a break join us to
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: improve your English skills while getting inspired for the day ahead and today joining me is Shimin, welcome
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: So Shumin, today we're going to start with rock and roll bands You are big into music and we know you not only like jazz and blues but also rock and roll rock and roll has been with us for ages It's part of our lives so we're going to start off with the rock and roll band
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: of all generations the Beatles Yes, and the quote from Beatles says life is what happens to you while you are busy making other plans and this came from John Lennon's beautiful boy song lyrics in 1980 and we know John Lennon a big big legend, right? So the Beatles formed in Liverpool in 1960 became the most influential band in popular music
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: History initially they performed in Hamburg Germany playing in clubs for up to eight hours a night This period was crucial for their development They had to learn German phrases to communicate with audiences making them understand the importance of connecting with listeners across language barriers The band's original lineup included John Lennon Paul McCartney George Harrison Pete Best who is later replaced by Ringo Starr and Stuart Sutka
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: Their manager Brian Epstein discovered them at Liverpool's Cavern Club where they had played nearly 300 times The band holds multiple records They have the most number one hits on the Billboard Hot 100 have sold over 1.6 billion records worldwide and were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 1988 Interestingly despite their global success none of the Beatles could read or write
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: musical notation They learned their music by ear proving that formal training isn't always necessary for artistic achievement The journey from working-class Liverpool to international stardom demonstrates how music can transcend cultural and linguistic boundaries

chunks.chunk_text: Mercury who grew up in Zanzibar in India before moving to England spoke multiple languages including English, Hindi and Gujarati The band's name Queen was chosen by Mercury who said

chunks.chunk_text: The band's live aid performance in 1985 is considered one of the greatest live performances in rock history Queen have sold over 300 million records worldwide making them one of the best selling music artists of all time

chunks.chunk_text: This is a quote from Freddie Mercury in 1985 Our last and final quote of the day comes from Led Zeppelin another rock and roll legend
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: Led Zeppelin formed in London in 1968 after the Yardbirds dissolved and guitarist Jimmy Page recruited singer Robert Plant drummer John Bonham and bassist John Paul Jones The band's name came from a joke by Keith Moon of The Who who said their idea would go down like a lead balloon They changed the spelling to LED to prevent mispronunciation
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: Their first album was recorded in just 36 hours with a cost of £1,782 Led Zeppelin pioneered album-oriented rock and creative studio techniques They were one of the first bands to use natural room acoustics for recording The band refused to release singles in the UK insisting their music should be heard as complete albums Their most famous song Stairway to Heaven was partly inspired
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: by Plant's interest in Celtic mythology and literature Plant wrote many of the band's lyrics while reading books about mythology, fantasy and JRR Tolkien's works showing how literature can influence songwriting When drummer John Bonham died in 1980 the band chose to dissolve rather than continue without him stating
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_15Mins 名人正念語錄 Inspirations Ep.10 _ 搖滾天團的經典名言 Inspirational quotes from Rock N Ro.json

chunks.chunk_text: The influence on rock music continues today with over 300 million records sold worldwide
